Person.Name: George H.W. Bush
Person.Description: George Bush was a late 20th century politician who was elected as President of the United States.

Person.Name: Winston Churchill
Person.Description: Winston Churchill was a mid 20th Century British politician who became famous as Prime Minister during the Second World War.

Person.Name: John F. Kennedy
Person.Description: JFK, as he was affectionately known, was a United States President who was assassinated in Dallas, Texas.
